title: YouTube Channels Manager (Opportunity)
job_overview:
We're hiring ELITE social media managers with plenty of experience who thrive under pressure, push limits, and are committed.

More specifically, we need experienced YouTube channel managers to handle, optimize, and grow our clients' YouTube channels.

You will plan and coordinate the execution of YouTube strategies with video editors and graphic designers to successfully grow our clients' channels.

If you're lazy, lack attention to detail, or are just "good enough," don't bother applying.

The mediocre don't stand a chance.

But if you're a killer with strong attention to detail, obsessed about content marketing, and already performing at the highest level, you'll do well here.

Our team ENJOYS:
> Superior, reliable, consistent, and predictable compensation
> Genuine team camaraderie beyond Slack messages
> Training and skills development
> Opportunities for career progress and growth
> A high-performance culture

These are the technical competencies we are ideally looking for:
1) Bachelor's or university-level degree.
2) 2+ years of experience as a YouTube manager.
3) 2+ years of experience in a leadership position managing a team of at least 3 - 5 people.
4) Experience using Asana, Slack, and Google Drive.

Other competencies:
5) C1+ English proficiency.
6) Excellent communication skills, attentive to detail, polite, and a team player.

Think you have what it takes? Prove it.
